title: Cardio and the "bear cam”
description:
Jillian and crew review their latest healthy obsessions. Jillian explains the do’s and don’ts of straight cardio so you get the desired results while avoiding injury or wasting your time. And the hottest supplements are discussed as well as ways to best bust sugar cravings. 


This Week's Sponsors...
